alert.note: Alert for Creek (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 2:47AM CDT until May 07 at 1:42AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Polecat Creek near Sapulpa affecting Creek County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Polecat Creek near Sapulpa. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, moderate flooding affects pasturelands and suburban roads between Sapulpa and Jenks. Livestock barns and other outbuildings are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:19 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 26.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.0 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
